metadata.synopsis: A traveling couple is stuck on Rivington bridge and discuss lodging option. The flophouse is not their prefered choice, but the alternative is Sharess Caress. This is the tiefling one liner
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 6; 52; 66- Talk to the tiefling.

0.speaker: Rilia
0.text: Looking for lodgings? Don't bother - all the decent places are gone. Damned coronation.

1.speaker: Rilia
1.text: All I want is a clean, warm room - is that too much to ask for?
